title: 4 Pack Mini Butter Slime Ball Kit for Girls, Party Favors Premade Slime Toys, Soft Stretchy Clear Crunchy, for Stress Relief Toy Girls Boys, Birthday Gift, Kids Party Favors
features: 【Cake Ball】Our slime kit is a cake themed butter slime, equipped with four macaron colored balls, each containing a mini two tone butter slime. It also comes with 4 packs of crumbs, as well as cute cake charms and stickers.

【Slime Party Favors for Kids】This 4 packs ball slime kit with a wide variety of slime add-ins and cute slime charms, it is a party favour for kids and a great gift choice for all kinds of festivals, birthdays, Christmas, Easter.
【Usage Details】 Can be reused, put the slime back in the container after use to prevent drying out from prolonged exposure to air.If slime become dry, you can add some water or hand soap.

【Non-toxic & 100% Safe】Our pink slime kit for kids is made of high quality raw materials, non-toxic, safe for adults and children, but please do not eat it! Please note that children under the age of 3 years old under the supervision of use.

【Stress Relief】This slime party favor great for adults and kids. Parents can buy them for kids playing; teachers can buy them for students reward; Adults can buy for stress relief by squeezing stretching and pulling the slime.
description: Product description Indulge in the Ultimate Sensory Escape with Our Butter Slime 4-Pack! ﻿ Let your fingertips glide through the silky-smooth, buttery texture of our premium slime – a sensory delight that’s irresistibly stretchy, squishy, and oh-so-satisfying. Whether you’re unwinding after work, seeking focus during study sessions, or looking for a creative toy your kids will adore, this 4-pack delivers endless tactile joy. ﻿ Why You’ll Love It: ✨ 4 Colours, Endless Possibilities Rotate between calming pastel hues or mix colours to create mesmerising swirls. Each slime ball offers hours of ASMR-friendly play. ﻿ ✨ Designed for Lasting Enjoyment Our advanced formula retains moisture longer than standard slimes. Store in included resealable containers to keep freshness for weeks! ﻿ ✨ Safe & Hassle-Free Play Worried about sticky residue? Our slime cleans up effortlessly from surfaces and skin. Perfect for home, travel, or classroom use. ﻿ Ideal For: Stress relief & anxiety management Sensory play for kids with ADHD/autism Fidget-friendly desk companion Unique stocking stuffers or gift boxes ﻿ Note: For best results, knead slime before use and store away from direct heat. Includes 4 butter slime balls in individual containers. Safety Warning NO
